alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 3:55PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday, with locally higher amounts possible. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches through this evening. * WHERE...Southwest Utah. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 11 AM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions can be expected into the evening, particularly across the higher passes along I-15.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
